Posts.Content: Sep 24, 2009 07:25AM Marsha56 wrote: Okay ladies one day at a time only worked for me for about ayear... But I am 13 years StageIV and living a pretty good life. Know I make my life plans in 3 months range. So it is doable and sure I have very sad day's. But most of all I will say I have seen many events in my life that doctor's never thought I would see. But I am an will until the Lord takes my hand to my new life and home! Currently a week out finding out I have brain mets.. Three more rads treatment's and done with that for know. I believe that as you except what you have life gets better and so does your streghtn and fight! So let's keep being warrior's and go head and have those pissed off days and down day's . Then pick your self up and go for the run!!! If you are struck reach out that's what we are for!! Keep the faith and peace,

Posts.Content: Jul 5, 2008 06:56PM Marsha56 wrote: CMD, I am a five year liver mets warrior. I have had mets to my liver, bones, nodes in neck. So I am hear to tell you that you can beat this and your life will be great again. I am currently NED, I am doing the MCCD-1 trail and it is working for me . I also did Xelosda and Trykerb for two and half years and it control my liver met for a long time. Please feel free to ask me anything. You can to do this sister and you WILL! hugs and peace, Marsha56

Posts.Content: Jul 4, 2007 08:56AM Marsha56 wrote: Wow,I could have wrote your message. My family of four sisters and mom. Not one of them over the last 12 years have ever talked with me about my cancer!! I have just this week sent all of them and email and said I was done with all of them that I was sick of them pretending that I was not sick. Not once have they taken me to chemo or make a dinner for me. The icing on the cake was my father just died a month ago, I quit speaking to him two years ago when he came for a visit and said well this is probaly the last time I will see you before you die. And then he told me he would not could back for my funeral!!! Yea that is just what I wanted to hear. So he cut me out of his will, and my sisters honored his wish! They are well aware how bad my money situation is, but they really did'nt give a sh--. So I am done with the bs and the hurt they have caused me! So I totally understand how you feel. Thanks for letting me vent. If it was not for my chruch family and friends I am not sure where I would be! I tell myself. Life is hard and God is good! Hang in there!
